t: Eberhard Faber | Pencil Manufacturer, Stationery Innovator & Entrepreneur | Britannica Money
s: Faber moved to the United States in 1849 and built a manufacturing plant in 1861, the first large-scale American pencil factory, to serve an American market previously supplied by exports from his brother’s plant in Europe. The Eberhard Faber Pencil Company was incorporated in 1898.

Eberhard grew up with two brothers who were older than him: One is called Lothar, the other Johann. All three were born with pencils in their cradle. When his father died, his eldest brother, Lothar, took over the management of the manufactory. Lothar writes industrial history: His company A.W. Faber turns pencils into brand ...
